summary: A PDF manipulation website called 'Create your own PDF' with multiple conversion and editing tools, featuring a red-themed UI
architectural_notes: Web-based PDF manipulation platform with multiple conversion tools
Client-side or server-side PDF processing needs to be determined
Red color scheme as primary brand identity
User-friendly upload interface required for PDFs and images
PDF translation feature requires text extraction, translation API integration, and layout preservation
PDF translator must use AI-based translation service for all translation operations
Tamil language must be supported in PDF translator for both source and target translations
known_issues: Download functionality broken across multiple PDF tools (needs comprehensive fix)

existing_features.title: Implement PDF to image converter that allows users to upload a PDF file and convert each page to individual image files (PNG or JPEG format)
Implement image to PDF converter that allows users to upload one or multiple image files and combine them into a single PDF document
Implement document to PDF converter that converts common document formats (DOCX, TXT, RTF) to PDF
Implement PDF to document converter that extracts text content from PDF and converts it to editable document formats (DOCX, TXT)
Implement PDF splitter that allows users to split a PDF into multiple files by selecting specific page ranges or extracting individual pages
Implement PDF merge functionality that allows users to combine multiple PDF files into a single document
Implement PDF unlock feature that removes password protection from encrypted PDFs when the correct password is provided
Implement PDF editing options including adding text annotations, highlighting, drawing shapes, and inserting signatures
Create a red-themed UI design that is clean, modern, and attractive with consistent use of red as the primary brand color throughout the interface
Design an intuitive file upload interface that accepts PDF and image files with drag-and-drop support and clear visual feedback
Create a homepage with clear navigation showcasing all available PDF tools (convert, split, merge, unlock, edit) with easy access to each feature
Implement PDF translator feature that converts PDF documents from one language to another language while preserving the original document layout and alignment
Display a prominent disclaimer message 'Images that include text may not be translated properly' on the PDF translator page to inform users about translation limitations
Add PDF Translator navigation item to the homepage and main navigation menu alongside existing PDF tools
Create a new PDF Translator page component with file upload interface, language selection controls, translation preview, and download functionality
Fix PDF translator to perform actual translation on uploaded PDF documents instead of using placeholder logic
Fix download functionality in Image to PDF converter to properly generate and download the combined PDF file
Replace the current MyMemory translation API integration in the PDF translator with an AI-based translation service that provides more reliable and accurate translations for PDF documents
Ensure the PDF translator reliably extracts text from uploaded PDFs, translates all extracted content, and generates a downloadable translated PDF with preserved formatting
Add Tamil language as both source and target language option in the PDF translator language selection dropdowns
Fix the download functionality in the Image to PDF converter to properly generate and download the combined PDF file with all uploaded images
Fix the download functionality in the PDF to Image converter to properly generate and download individual image files or a zip archive of all converted pages
Fix the download functionality in the PDF Splitter to properly generate and download the split PDF file containing selected pages
Fix the download functionality in the PDF Merge tool to properly generate and download a single combined PDF file from multiple uploaded PDFs
Fix the download functionality in the Document to PDF converter to properly generate and download a PDF file from uploaded DOCX, TXT, or RTF documents
Fix the download functionality in the PDF to Document converter to properly generate and download editable document files (DOCX or TXT) from uploaded PDFs
Fix the download functionality in the PDF Unlock tool to properly generate and download the unlocked PDF after password removal
Fix the download functionality in the PDF Editor to properly generate and download the edited PDF with all annotations, text, highlights, shapes, and signatures applied

Verify and ensure the PDF Translator reliably extracts text from uploaded PDFs, translates all content using the LibreTranslate API, and generates a downloadable translated PDF with preserved formatting

new_feature_requests.summary: Red-themed UI design that is clean and attractive
File upload interface for PDFs and images
PDF translator to convert PDFs from one language to another with proper alignment and disclaimer about image text translation
Add Tamil language support to PDF translator
Fix download functionality across all PDF tools
